remarks: Lemma for ~ 4sq .  The set ` S ` is the set of all numbers that are expressible as a sum of four squares.  Our goal is to show that ` S = NN0 ` ; here we show one subset direction.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jul-2014.)
